typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		USERNAME as string,
		FIRSTNAME as string,
		LASTNAME as string,
		MIDDLENAME as string,
		STATUS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['/users/users.csv']) ~> pm1Users
pm1Users sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		uid as string,
		firstname as string,
		lastname as string,
		middlename as string,
		status as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ic_users.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> investcloudUsers
